articles.title: First Blood Moon of 2022: What is it and why ancient civilisations feared it - WION
articles.description: Earth will soon witness a Blood Moon. From parts of Antarctica, the Americas, as well as western Europe, Africa and parts of the eastern Pacific, the eclipse will be visible late May 15th and early May 16th.
